items.content_html: MathMate is a lightweight and intuitive scientific calculator designed to simplify your mathematical computations. Developed using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript, MathMate offers a user-friendly interface coupled with robust functionality.

items.content_html: MeetLite is a lightweight Google Meet clone developed with a focus on simplicity and efficiency. Leveraging the power of WebRTC technology, MeetLite enables seamless video and audio communication between users in real-time. The initial signaling between peers is facilitated through Agora RTM, ensuring smooth and reliable connections.
items.title: spacecowbye/MeetLite: MeetLite is a lightweight Google Meet clone developed with a focus on simplicity and efficiency. Leveraging the power of WebRTC technology, MeetLite enables seamless video and audio communication between users in real-time. The initial signaling between peers is facilitated through Agora RTM, ensuring smooth and reliable connections.
